definition: to escalate (in intensity)/to go up by one grade/to be promoted/to upgrade (computing)
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank

sentences.english: Just a few things off the top of my head regarding upgradable bags.
sentences.chinese: 一些关于背包升级的想法一直在我脑海里盘旋。

sentences.english: Mio Wei stressed that over the next five years is the critical period of China's industrial transformation and upgrading.
sentences.chinese: 苗圩强调，未来五年是我国工业转型升级的攻坚时期。

sentences.english: If the system can use NESYS upgrade for the Japanese version of the arcade.
sentences.chinese: 如果利用NESYS系统能为日本版街机升级。

sentences.english: Participate facility and equipment upgrades to improve plant productivity and throughput.
sentences.chinese: 参与升级厂房设施与设备以提高产率产量。

sentences.english: Japan's parliament has passed legislation to upgrade the country's defense agency into a full ministry.
sentences.chinese: 日本国会通过议案，将日本防卫厅升级为省。

sentences.english: As well as a blacksmith upgrade for purchasing additional war machines.
sentences.chinese: 而且铁匠铺可以升级以购买额外的战争机器。

sentences.english: He faces an uphill battle against either Obama or Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 他将面对与奥巴马或者希拉里的升级选战。

sentences.english: An unresolvable problem occurred while calculating the upgrade.
sentences.chinese: 计算升级时发生不能解决的问题。

sentences.english: This mode use to recover from lost passwords and update IOS software.
sentences.chinese: 这种模式可以用来恢复密码和升级IOS。

sentences.english: Save this change and finish the remaining steps of the upgrader.
sentences.chinese: 将此修改保存并继续生下来的升级程序步骤。

sentences.english: The VRC PRO upgrade-refund guarantee works as follows.
sentences.chinese: 添加专业的升级退款保证工程如下。

sentences.english: Usefull to upgrade or recover your tablet.
sentences.chinese: 用于升级或恢复您的平板。

sentences.english: These changes will cost money, but they should be cheaper than decarbonization.
sentences.chinese: 升级改造需要资金，但这要比脱碳费用低。

sentences.english: Traditionally fighting escalates in Afghanistan as the weather turns warmer.
sentences.chinese: 在阿富汗，随着气候的转暖，战斗就会升级。

sentences.english: You can upgrade from self-catering accommodation to a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 您可以将自理膳食旅店升级为酒店。

sentences.english: Then click the Level Up button located under your character's picture.
sentences.chinese: 然后点击人物图片下面的升级按钮。

definition: to transition to a new dynasty or regime/to replace an older product with an upgraded, new-generation one
to replace the old with new/to renew/to renovate/to upgrade/to update/to regenerate
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
